Articles.Content: So, I've been playing ksp for some time and one day most of the textures decided to glitch and stretch out for miles and I wanted to know if this was a fixable problem or common and if it might be my graphics card thats too old to run ksp properly.

Hey EliteBurgundyWaffle, welcome to the KSP forums!

 

Can you post a screenshot?   Ive had the RAM on my gfx card slowly die on me, and it presents a telltale glitchiness to the visuals.  It could of course be something else too.  

Is your game updated?  Have you tried reinstalling, or checking the file integrity on Steam (if you have it).

Does the visual oddity happen with other games too?

Edited March 2, 2019 by klesh
Added greeting for 1 post.
It has happened to other games, I'll send a pic as soon as I get home
